title: Salmon, asparagus and goat's cheese pie
ingredients: ['2 sheets shortcrust pastry', '1 knob butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '110g (4 oz) button mushrooms, finely chopped', 'cooking oil', '2 salmon fillets', '4 asparagus spears', "110g (4 oz) Welsh goat's cheese", '1 egg, beaten']
